content.webTitle: Why do slugs and snails eat pricey plants rather than weeds in my garden?

fields.headline: Why do slugs and snails eat pricey plants rather than weeds in my garden?
fields.bodyText: Why don’t slugs and snails eat the weeds in the garden? Why do they go for the more expensive plants? How do they know? David Withey, Malvern, Worcs Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
